summary.para: The MULTICAST_MODE_TYPE enumeration specifies the filter mode for multicast group addresses.

remarks.para: This enumeration is supported on Windows Vista and later.

The MULTICAST_MODE_TYPE enumeration is used in the gf_fmode member of the structure to determine if a list of IP addresses should included or excluded. The values from this enumeration can also be used in the imsf_fmode member of the structure.
The MULTICAST_MODE_TYPE enumeration is defined in the Ws2ipdef.h header file which is automatically included in the Ws2tcpip.h header file. The Ws2ipdef.h header files should never be used directly.

summary.para: The filter contains a list of IP addresses to include.
The filter contains a list of IP addresses to exclude.
